Name: 救赎抉择Resurrection
About the game: 1、Resurrection is a seamless map horizontal 3D action game. The map is large and multi-branch plot has many endings. It can kill the NPC to unlock the hidden equipment, but the corresponding hidden plot and the hidden boss can not be unlocked. 2、The Game has traditional combat mode, there is no gorgeous special effects and links, pay attention to the one-by-one cracking and analysis. 3、There are more than 20 different weapons (sword shield, axe shield, gun shield, knife, sword, double-edged sword, double-knife, backhand sword, hammer, bow and arrow, punch, bayonet, halberd, axe, etc.) in the game, which can press up、down and directly attack and cooperate to play different multi-stage maneuvers, magic and divinity. The game has the effect of weight bearing. If it exceeds the upper limit of weight bearing, it can not move. If it exceeds a certain percentage of weight bearing, it will slow down the moving speed. 4、The game has a variety of combat methods, attack, interruption, backstab, defensive block, rebound, evasion and so on. The ability to unlock jumps, air sprints, flights, levitations, and transmissions helps explore maps.
